meanings.definition: The state or quality of being untidy.
meanings.sent1: The untidiness of his room made it hard to find anything.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't stand the untidiness of the kitchen and decided to clean it up.
meanings.sent3: The untidiness of the dog's fur after rolling in the mud was quite comical.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a whirlwind of untidiness, chaotic and disorganized.
meanings.sent5: The untidiness of the garden was like a wild jungle, untamed and overgrown.

meanings.sent1: The untidiness of the paperwork on his desk was overwhelming.
meanings.sent2: The room's untidiness was a result of neglect and lack of care.
meanings.sent3: The untidiness of the party decorations gave the room a quirky charm.
meanings.sent4: The untidiness of her thoughts mirrored the chaos of the storm outside.
meanings.sent5: The untidiness of the streets after the parade was a colorful mess of confetti and streamers.
